resources.string: Paintroid
l\'info
Information sur Paintroid...
Paintroid pour Catroid :-)
Choisissez la forme et / ou la largeur
Choisissez une couleur
Enregistrer l\'image
Donnez une filname...
Voulez-vous Ã©craser un fichier existant?
Help
I\'m the scroll hand. With me you can scroll in your picture.
I\'m the magnifying glass. With me you can zoom in and out just move your finger over the screen
I\'m the brush. With me you can draw on your picture
I\'m the eyedropper. I can help you to select a color from your picture
I\'m the undo arrow. I can make your latest changes undone.
I\'m the redo arrow. I can redraw your latest undos.
I\'m the stroke\'n\'shape picker. I can help you to choose the shape and size of your brush.
I\'m the cursor.\n\nWith me you can draw on your picture precisely.
I\'m the hand.\n\nWith me you can adjust the picture.
I\'m the stamp.\n\nWith me you can duplicate a chosen part of your picture.
With me you can import one of your pictures.
